Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "Locate objects recursively, based on a specific property criteria.\\r\\n\\r\\nYou can also refine one step (but multiple times) based on the previous results. For example if you search for the propery \\"alteration:binding leather\\" in all folder objects, you can then search for \\"alteration:color white\\" on the objects returned in the previous search."

"+propfind \\"MGeneric:UrMale appearance:eyecolor blue\\"\\r\\n Locate any male characters who have the property \\"appearance:eyecolor\\" set to \\"blue\\"\\r\\n\\r\\n+propfind \\"prev appearance:hairlength long\\"\\r\\n Search based on the previous results for any object with the property \\"appearance:hairlength\\" set to \\"long\\"."
